issue.title: Build SplitSync - Debug Test
issue.body:
Build SplitSync expense sharing app.

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 16.1.4
- TypeScript 5.9.3
- Drizzle ORM with SQLite
- Socket.io for real-time
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

Features:
1. User authentication
2. Group management
3. Expense tracking
4. Balance calculations
5. Settlement tracking
6. Real-time updates

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 16.1.4 project with TypeScript 5.9.3, configure Tailwind CSS, ESLint, Prettier, create .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies (drizzle-orm, better-sqlite3, socket.io, socket.io-client, next-auth, bcrypt, zod), tsconfig.json, next.config.js, postcss.config.js, tailwind.config.ts, .env.example, CI workflow (.github/workflows/ci.yml with lint, typecheck, test, build jobs), and README.md with setup instructions

analysisSummary: Implement SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16.1.4, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM with SQLite, Socket.io real-time, and Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui. Features include user authentication, group management, expense tracking, balance calculations, settlement tracking, and real-time updates.

pendingEMs.task: Create Drizzle ORM schema and database configuration. Define SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, balances, and settlements. Create drizzle.config.ts, database connection utilities, migration files, and seed data. Implement database initialization and connection pooling.

Implement authentication system using NextAuth.js (Auth.js). Create authentication API routes, user registration/login logic, password hashing with bcrypt, session management, and auth middleware. Build login and signup pages with form validation using Zod.

Build group management functionality. Create API routes for CRUD operations on groups (create, read, update, delete). Implement group member management (add, remove members). Create group listing page, group creation form, and group detail view.

Implement expense tracking system. Create API routes for expense CRUD operations. Build expense creation forms with amount, description, payer, and split method (equal, exact, percentage). Create expense listing pages and expense detail views. Implement expense editing and deletion.

Build balance calculation engine. Implement algorithms to calculate individual balances within groups, total owed/owing amounts, and net balances. Create balance summary API endpoints. Build dashboard components showing user's overall financial position and per-group balances.

Implement settlement tracking system. Create settlement recording API endpoints. Build settlement suggestion algorithm to minimize number of transactions (debt simplification). Create settlement history views and payment recording interface. Mark settlements as complete/pending.

Implement real-time updates using Socket.io. Set up Socket.io server on Next.js custom server. Create WebSocket event handlers for expense creation, group updates, and settlement changes. Build client-side Socket.io integration with React hooks for real-time UI updates.

Build reusable UI component library using shadcn/ui patterns. Implement button, input, card, modal, dropdown, toast notification, data table, form components, and layout components. Ensure consistent styling and accessibility across all components.

Create main dashboard and user profile pages. Build landing page with app overview. Implement user settings page (profile editing, password change). Create activity feed showing recent expenses and settlements. Build notification system for important events.
